suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Centro, Arganda', 'title': 'Semi-detached house in Calle Rafael Alberti'}
description: We do not charge the buyer. Fantastic semi-detached house in Arganda del Rey, belonging to the central area very close to the Southeast University Hospital. It has 225 meters of plot and 191 meters of housing that are distributed in: -Ground floor, initially has an entrance area as a 30-meter terrace, before entering the house, we continue with a hall, guest toilet with window, full kitchen, large living-dining room with pellet and wood fireplace with access to a second terrace of 26 meters and access to the garden with 102 meters currently with a tubular pool. -First floor, it has four bedrooms, one of them corresponds to the master bedroom with a bay window and en-suite bathroom.It has built-in wardrobes in all bedrooms and another independent bathroom serving the rest of the bedrooms. From the ground floor we access the garage that has two electric entry/exit doors to the street and a current laundry area or multipurpose space. It has a currently unfurnished attic floor with a possible option to expand the home if desired. The outdoor area has a porch and garden space mentioned above with the current pool.Regarding the garden, as you will see, it is currently divided into two spaces because originally, even though it belonged to the property, it belonged to natural gas in usufruct.As of today, Natural Gas formalized its renunciation of the land and belongs to the property in full ownership, currently already registered in the property registry.No unification of the land has been carried out so that the future buyer can carry it out according to his needs. Other features: It has recently installed solar panels to supply light, heating and hot water through an individual gas boiler, air conditioning in the living room and in each bedroom, double windows with mosquito nets in each room, wooden floors. It also belongs to a community of only 11 chalets that have another community pool. About the area: 25 kilometers from the capital in a southeasterly direction, within the region that connects the so-called Alcarria of Madrid with the plain of the Jarama River, Arganda del Rey is located.History, tradition, nature and modernity merge in today's Arganda. Almost half of its municipal area is located within the Southeast Regional Park, a protected environmental space due, among other things, to the fact that the white stork nests in Arganda, where the lower courses of the Manzanares and Jarama rivers converge, an enclave where nature and fauna They make up a perfect place to enjoy with the family.

suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Centro, Arganda', 'title': 'Flat in valdeparazuelos'}
description: CHANCE! CENTRAL AREA, 3 BEDROOMS WITH TERRACE. In perfect condition, to enter to live. description: FREE HOUSING. Excellent 3-bedroom apartment in the 'Los Villares' area, Arganda del Rey. Don't miss this opportunity, in very good condition, to move into. House of 93 m2 useful, distributed in hall. Very spacious and bright living room, with views of the same street. Furnished kitchen, with high and low furniture and access to a closed/glazed drying terrace where the wet area is located. In addition, this area has a storage closet. 3 exterior bedrooms, with built-in wardrobes. One of the bedrooms is a suite, very large, with large spaces and a full bathroom with a bathtub. This bedroom, in addition to being very spacious and enjoying lots of light, has an area of built-in wardrobes with great storage. A second bathroom located in the hallway with a bathtub. Housing facing southeast. Wooden floors. Air conditioning in living room and master bedroom. Windows changed, folding with RPT. Among other features. Garage and storage included. Very quiet building, with well-kept common areas. 'Los Villares' area, one of the most sought-after areas of Arganda. Excellent location, given its proximity to Arganda line 9 metro station and communications with A3 and R3 roads. A few minutes from supermarkets, schools, institutes, pharmacies, etc. Surrounded by green areas. Call us and come meet him, don't miss the opportunity. /.

suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Perlita, Arganda', 'title': 'Penthouse in Calle Presidente José María Aznar'}
description: Fantastic unique penthouse in the area. All exterior with wonderful clear views. Hall with built-in wardrobe and large storage capacity. 40 meter living room with two rooms and a large window that provides a lot of light. Motorized blinds. Access to terrace with fabulous views. Furnished kitchen with access to drying terrace. Three large bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and large storage capacity. Master bedroom suite with jacuzzi bathtub and large shower. Exit to the terrace from the master bedroom. Another large bathroom with window and bathtub that serves the other two bedrooms. LED lighting throughout the house. Ducted air conditioning with heat pump. Natural gas heating and hot water. Awnings on the terraces. Hose taps at two points on the terrace, one of them with a programmer and irrigation. Light points and sockets on the terrace. Completely renovated three years ago and very well preserved. 271 meters built and 166 useful meters of housing. 101 meters of terrace that surrounds the entire house. East, west, north and south orientation. Two large parking spaces and a storage room included in the price. Common area with swimming pool, paddle tennis court and playground surrounded by green areas. Concierge and 24-hour security. A few minutes from the Sureste Hospital, schools and public transport. Easy access to A3 and R3. Financial study service and help to obtain a mortgage loan. Moving and cleaning service. Possibility of customizing the home with an architectural studio. Comprehensive and exclusive service with expert professionals. Possibility of expanding information and contact with the real estate agency. 271 m² built. 166 useful m². 3 bedrooms. 2 bathrooms. Terrace. Balcony. Second hand/Good condition. Built-in cabinets. Storage room. Year of construction: 2007. Access adapted to people with reduced mobility. Floor 6, exterior. With elevator. North, South, East, West orientation. Parking space included in the price. Air conditioner. Pool. Yard.

suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Los Villares, Arganda', 'title': 'Semi-detached house'}
description: If you are looking for a home that fills you with life, with large rooms, extra light and privacy, we have what you are looking for and if you think about it, you lose it! It is a semi-detached house in one of the best areas of Villares. It consists of 251 m² built and 210 m² useful. On a 315 m2 plot, completely tiled, with a 26 m² gazebo fully equipped, stone barbecue and a covered porch that gives access to the house. In the basement we have a garage with an automated door and capacity for two vehicles, a toilet and a room that can be set up as you wish or according to your needs. On the ground floor we find a spacious and wonderful independent living room of 32 m2 with fantastic natural light, a splendid kitchen with designer wall and base units, it has an office that can also be adapted as a bedroom on the ground floor, being a large advantage. This floor has a toilet. On the first floor we find 3 large bedrooms, previously this house had 4, 2 full bathrooms, one of them in the master bedroom and a 20 m2 terrace where you can contemplate sunsets on a whim. It has a large attic, open-plan and fully passable, with built-in base cabinets taking advantage of the sides, and from here we access a 9 m2 terrace. As for qualities, it has exterior carpentry in white climalit aluminum, interior carpentry in solid wood, the house as a whole consists of 4 built-in wardrobes, wooden floors and rustic stoneware, individual natural gas heating, ducted air conditioning, smooth paint. The bathrooms and toilets all have windows. THIS IS ONE OF THOSE HOUSES WITH ALL THE COMFORTS THAT MAKES LIFE EASIER. *Energy Certification: "E" *Taxes and expenses NOT INCLUDED: ITP or VAT, notary, registration, agency, appraisal, etc.

suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Los Villares, Arganda', 'title': 'Terraced house'}
description: Magnificent semi-detached house in the best area of Arganda Engel & Völkers presents this magnificent townhouse with five bedrooms in the best area of Arganda del Rey. This wonderful four-storey house is accessed by a beautiful and comfortable exterior staircase. The distribution of the house is as follows: On the main floor we have a large bright living room with access to an outdoor terrace where we can enjoy another outdoor dining area(33,69m), fully equipped kitchen (12,65m), toilet with window (2,98m), hall (3,51m) and hallway / staircase (9,28m). From the kitchen we access to a large outdoor patio with a prefabricated swimming pool, barbecue area and games. The second floor is accessed by a comfortable staircase where we find 4 beautiful bedrooms and two bathrooms, all with fitted closets and large windows. The master bedroom has an en suite bathroom. Bedroom 1 (13,41m), bedroom 2 (11,37m), bedroom 3 (8,59m), bedroom 4 (8,91m), bathroom 1 (7,22m), bathroom 2 (4,92m), hallway (3,77m). On the second floor we find a large attic fully equipped for the enjoyment of the lucky buyer. We also have a huge terrace with a large window (the measure is 19.88m). In the semi-basement floor we find a large garage for two large vehicles with automated doors (33.66 m), storage room or multipurpose room (5.62m), bathroom that serves the patio and pool area (2.36m), distributor (2.75m) and hallway / staircase (10.67m) and direct access to the rear courtyard. Arganda del Rey is a municipality that is in expansion, close to the capital, very well connected through the A3-R3 highway, public transport both bus and metro. In a few minutes you can be in any area of Madrid. In particular, the area of Los Villares where this great house is located is a highly demanded area, with a residential profile. It has all the necessary services such as supermarkets, leisure areas, sports, schools, kindergartens and a great gastronomic offer.

It is renovated with unbeatable qualities: stoneware floors, double glazed folding windows with blind mosquito nets, oak doors and a shower tray in the bathroom. Soundproof walls in the living room and air conditioning. Very well connected by bus lines 312,312A, 326,350 from the stop located in the Plaza de la Constitución just 5 minutes walk from the house, easy road access to the A-3, M-330 and R-3. Close to the Sureste Hospital, medical clinics, sports center, schools and institutes, both public and subsidized, parks, supermarkets and a shopping area. suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Los Villares, Arganda', 'title': 'Terraced house in Calle Perú'}
description: Great semi-detached house in LOS VILLARES with COMMUNITY POOL. In one of the residential areas most requested by our clients. House from 2006 of 178m2 built, divided into two floors OF 72M2, plus an attic of 54 m2. Porch for two vehicles and 83 m2 rear garden. - On the ground floor we access a generous porch, with a pedestrian door and vehicle access gate, and on the same porch there is a closed storage space. From the porch we access the house through the main door and from the hall the access to the kitchen is distributed, with a large independent laundry room. Toilet, comfortable stairs to go up to the second floor, living room with access to the garden. -On the first floor there are four bedrooms, two of them doubles and one smaller, served by a complete furnished bathroom with a shower. And the bedroom suite with its independent bathroom, furnished and with a bathtub. - Finally, on the second floor we access the open-plan 54m2 attic with infinite possibilities. QUALITIES: Garden with shed, part soldier and part grass. Furnished kitchen Stoneware floor in bathrooms and kitchen, the rest with flooring. Black lacquered double glass windows. Bars throughout the ground floor, all lacquered in black. Wardrobes in all rooms. Natural gas boiler and heating. Air conditioning with heat pump in living room, master bedroom and attic. Electric heaters in kitchen and upstairs hallway Solid wood carpentry and white lacquered main security door. THE HOUSE ALSO CONSISTS OF A COMMUNITY POOL AND GARDEN. It has all the services (Sports City, savings, clinic, schools, institute, sports city, restaurants, buses, metro, etc. ). Come see it, WE WILL HELP YOU WITH FINANCING. Get informed without obligation. [IW].

suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Centro, Arganda', 'title': 'Flat in Calle Telegrafista Jose Jackson , 2'}
description: The Camporrosso Prisma building will be next to the Plaza de la Concordia, in Arganda. It is next to the Metro and very good communication via the road network. It also has the Príncipe Felipe Sports City next to it, educational centers (IES José Saramago, Colegio Malvar,.. . ), Mercadona, Gyms,.. . It is a modern neighborhood, newly built, with a good pedestrian network. All this makes it an excellent option for a person who works anywhere in the Community of Madrid. A great place to live. There are aspects of the building that are not very visible, such as the large screen walls that form the special foundation, reinforced concrete walls up to 20 meters deep.. . Structural deployment that is a great economic effort, although little is seen. In addition, it is built with high quality materials, and careful attention to insulation and energy efficiency. The building is shaped like a prism. Powerful, elegant and minimalist. Based on straight lines, simplicity of shapes and light, seeking to maximize the light in each space. Your house, your life! Sales Office located at Calle Tren de Arganda 26. OPEN: Tuesdays and Fridays: from 10:00 a. m. to 2:00 p. m. and from 4:00 p. m. to 7:00 p. m. IMPORTANT NOTICE: Sales office will remain closed until January 4th (included). Happy Holidays!

LA AGENCIA DEL BARRIO sells a splendid semi-detached house with 228m2 of housing and 162m2 of plot in the residential area of "Mirador-Grillero" in Arganda, surrounded by essential shops, green areas, schools, etc. The property is divided into four floors: BASEMENT FLOOR: intended for open space, ideal for a games room, wine cellar, tool area, it has several possibilities. GROUND FLOOR: composed of a front entrance patio, hall, living room divided into two rooms with access to the rear garden of the house, separate kitchen and toilet that serves this floor FIRST FLOOR: composed of three bedrooms (one of them the main one with an en-suite bathroom and dressing room and two double bedrooms with a built-in wardrobe) and a full bathroom that serves the rest of the bedrooms. SECOND FLOOR: completely open space with a large trunk, ideal for a fourth bedroom, office, cinema room, with multiple options. Features: Armored main door, alarm, Sapelly doors, stoneware floors, aluminum windows finished in white, built-in wardrobes, gotelé walls, front patio, open garage, rear garden. ! suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Los Villares, Arganda', 'title': 'Flat'}
description: Redpiso Arganda del Rey offers a beautiful apartment for sale to move into in “Zona Los Villares, El Guijar. Magnificent home in the best residential area of Arganda del Rey. The apartment is completely exterior, very bright, in a building that is only a few years old, with common areas in a very quiet residential environment. The house consists of 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, one of them integrated into the master bedroom, a separate furnished kitchen with access to a covered clothesline and a beautiful living room. Built with top quality materials, with excellent finishes, double glazed aluminum windows with awnings, wooden doors, laminated flooring, built-in wardrobes in all bedrooms. The apartment has air conditioning with a hot/cold pump in the living room and the master bedroom, as well as Natural Gas heating with an independent boiler. The apartment is sold with a garage space and a storage room included. The building has an intercom, elevator and garden area. The house is located in one of the sought-after residential areas of Arganda, very well connected to the main roads (A3-R3-M300), as well as educational and health centers, Ciudad Deportiva Príncipe Felipe, metro station and Hospital del Southeast.

description: Are you interested in buying a 1-bedroom apartment for sale in Arganda del Rey? Excellent opportunity to own this residential apartment with an area of 57 m², well distributed in living room, separate kitchen, 1 large bedroom and 1 complete bathroom with shower located in the town of Arganda del Rey, province of Madrid. Arganda del Rey is located about 20 kilometers from Madrid. This location allows quick access to the capital and other nearby municipalities. The municipality has a wide variety of services, shops, supermarkets, restaurants, sports centers, parks and other amenities necessary for a comfortable life. It is well connected by road. The A-3 highway (Autovía del Este) connects the municipality with Madrid and other nearby towns. It has public transport services, such as bus lines and the Cercanías Renfe train station, which facilitates travel to Madrid and other areas of the Community. In addition, it is located 25 kilometers from the Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas Airport. Would you like more information? Do not hesitate to contact us. description: This exclusive home consists of 360m² distributed over 4 floors, completely renovated. It is a semi-detached house and has a GARAGE, TERRACE AND POOL. On the ground floor there is a large three-space garage along with a cellar and a toilet. Going up the stairs, on the 1st floor, we find a hall, a guest toilet, a living room with air conditioning, a lounge and a kitchen with a wonderful fully equipped island and direct access to the pool through a terrace with blinds. monitored electrical. On the 2nd floor there is a spacious and bright office with direct access to a large terrace that connects to the master bedroom, which has an en-suite bathroom with a Jacuzzi. In addition, 2 other bedrooms with views of the pool and a separate bathroom. On the 3rd floor there is a spacious and bright boardwalk that is the same size as an entire floor, which has access to another solarium terrace. In the garden we find a wonderful swimming pool with a large porch. A great opportunity just 30 minutes from Madrid Ready. to enter to live. SOUTH orientation, receives light throughout the day. It has large windows, is fully equipped, with very large spaces, high ceilings and great distribution possibilities. Very bright, with smooth walls and wide doors. The façade of the house is very well cared for. Heating is individual by natural gas. No community fees. IBI: €700/year. It has a garage, storage room, and swimming pool. Good transport communication: Buses and subways such as L9. Numerous schools. Both public and private health centers, pharmacy a few meters away. Parks and sports centers It is a beautiful house and decorated with great taste. Without a doubt, it is an opportunity to live and enjoy in a residential, familiar and very quiet neighborhood near the center of Madrid. We have the keys to the property. suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Centro, Arganda', 'title': 'Flat in Puerta del Parque'}
description: Without agency commission to the buyer! Apartment for sale to renovate to your liking of 103 m2 with common areas, 98 m2 built and approximately 85 m2 useful. It has an alarm and other security measures, video intercom. It has three bedrooms and a very spacious living room with access to a terrace of more than ten linear meters that allows you to put a table and several chairs with views of the main street. Rectangular kitchen, with access to a terrace-clothesline and a very large pantry in which an additional bathroom or dressing room can be installed that would remain inside the bedroom after the improvement work. We recommend visiting the house, as it is unfurnished and without any decoration, so its full potential and spaciousness are not shown in the photographs. It is located next to the Carlos González Bueno municipal park and a minute walk to the metro Line 9 with a stop in Arganda del Rey. In its surroundings, there is a private clinic, traditional commerce, cafes, Souk de Arganda, Pharmacy and two public schools. Institute, private charter school "El Malvar" and the Príncipe Felipe Sports City just 5 minutes away without taking the car. Bus stop in front of the house. Arganda del Rey has three Health Centers and a regional Hospital and is very well connected by A-3, just 27 km from Madrid's Puerta del Sol. The town has 58,000 inhabitants and one of the most important commercial, industrial and service areas in Spain, where it is easy to find or improve your current job.

suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Centro, Arganda', 'title': 'Flat in Francisco Rabal'}
description: Welcome to your new home! This exterior apartment is perfect for those looking for a bright and spacious home. Upon entering the foyer, you will find a built-in closet that will allow you to keep your home organized. The spacious 28 square meter living room has two rooms and a large bay window that provides natural light to the entire room. In addition, the apartment has air conditioning for your comfort. The house has three bedrooms, one of them en suite with a bathtub and air conditioning, and built-in wardrobes with a large storage capacity. The two bathrooms, one with a bathtub and the other with a shower, will allow you to enjoy a comfortable and functional home. The kitchen has a glassed-in drying terrace and is equipped with everything you need to cook delicious meals. The apartment has individual gas heating, smooth walls, wooden floors and double glazed windows for your comfort. In addition, the building has an elevator and the house includes a parking space and a storage room. Community fees are €70 and the IBI is €600. The location of the home is unbeatable, surrounded by services such as supermarkets, pharmacies, schools, clinics and buses. In addition, it has easy access to the A3 and R3 and there are restaurants nearby. We offer a financial study service and help in obtaining a mortgage loan, as well as the possibility of customizing the home with an architectural study. We also offer a comprehensive and exclusive service with expert professionals, moving and cleaning. Contact us for more information!
